description.english: I killed the enemy at once.
The number that killed the enemy at one time is 5 times.
The number that killed the enemy at one time is 10 times.
The number that killed the enemy at one time is 50 times.

displayName.english: It's a routine to kill at once.

description.english: The number that killed the enemy at one time is 100 times.

displayName.english: You are not a newbie now!

description.english: I cleared Wave for the first time.

displayName.english: I am a user who can play.
Yo~ Do you like this game?
Wow! You play so much! How great is that?
Now it's time to start my dream!

description.english: We cleared the stage for the first time.
The stage has been successfully completed 10 times.
The stage has been successfully completed 100 times.

displayName.english: This game is in my hands.

description.english: The stage has been successfully completed 1,000 times.
I took a total of 10 zombies.

displayName.english: The dead bodies at your feet.

description.english: I took a total of 100 zombies.
I took a total of 1,000 zombies.
I took a total of 10,000 zombies.

displayName.english: It's the same whether it's special or not.
He's a boss, and I'm a boss.
Are you the boss? I am the big boss.
The boss does not mean anything to me.

description.english: I destroyed the zombie body part 10 times.

displayName.english: Does he have arms and legs?

description.english: I destroyed the zombie body part 100 times.
I destroyed the zombie body part 1,000 times.

displayName.english: All of your body parts are in me.

description.english: I destroyed the zombie body part 10,000 times.

displayName.english: The weapon and I are one.
Take a good look at these grenades.
A good grenade is a lot of grenades.

description.english: I destroyed my weapon for the first time.

displayName.english: I told you to cherish your weapons!
I can not put the money in my wallet.
I am a symbol of wealth.
Do you have a lot of wealth?
There is no way to end the shopping.

description.english: I purchased my first sight mod.

displayName.english: A gun without a sight is not a gun.
I think my eyes are getting better!

description.english: I purchased my first foregrip mod.

displayName.english: The Recoil is not allowed in all weapon.

description.english: I purchased my first magazine mod.
I purchased my first laser mod.

displayName.english: Your body has a red dot?
No fast sighting without a laser beam.
I do not doubt that this is a laser gun.

description.english: I purchased my first flash mod.

displayName.english: Like a lamp in a room
There is no darkness around me.
I see a halo from me.
I am the light and the truth.
I thought I was going to die.
Where I am is the realm of death.

description.english: The number that killed the enemy at one time is 500 times.

displayName.english: Become a friend with the developer!
